title: Im gold 4 and my gf is silver 2 and we cant play
body: hey guys so just after the season 9 update, me and my gf cant play together anymore, i am gold 4 and she is silver 2, it come up you have to much of a rank difference, have they changed how u can play with people or is it just a bug atm?

replies.body: There's been some issues with ranks that got increased by the preseason changes (from Div 5 to Div 4) not registering properly for borders, it's *possible* this is related. If it is, then a fix will be rolling out next patch. If it's not, them I'm unsure what else it could be.
